articles.author: Daniel Lewis
articles.title: Local sniper who spotted Trump shooter 1.5 hours before failed assassination attempt speaks out | CNN Politics
articles.description: Members of a local SWAT team assisting in security for Donald Trump’s July 13 rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, spoke to ABC News about what led to the failed assassination attempt.
articles.content: Members of a local SWAT team assisting in security for Donald Trumps July 13 rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, spoke to ABC News about what led to the failed assassination attempt.

articles.author: Anthony Macdonald
articles.title: Jabiluka mining ban: When politics and miners mix, investors get hurt
articles.description: The last thing investors need in Australian mining is more shocks like the ban on uranium mining at Jabiluka. The industry is doing it hard enough.
articles.content:
When youre a busted company and the prime minister starts sniffing around your regulatory filings, you should be worried.
If youre also a miner with long-time traditional owner issues and a politica… [+50 chars]
